title: mris_anatomical_stats
description: This program computes a number of anatomical properties.

thickness_range.title: Thickness Range
thickness_range.description: Only consider thicknesses in the specified range.

thickness_file.title: Thickness File
thickness_file.description: Use specified file for computing thickness statistics

annotation_file.title: Annotation File
annotation_file.description: Compute properties for each label in the annotation file separately

tablefile.title: Table File
tablefile.description: Table output to tablefile. Must use -a or -l options to specify input.

logfile.title: Log File
logfile.description: Write stats to file named log

nsmooth.title: Number of Smoothing Iterations
nsmooth.description: Smooth thickness map # of iterations before using it

color_table.title: Color Table File
color_table.description: Output annotation file's color table to text file

noglobal.title: No Global Stats Flag
noglobal.description: Do not compute global brain stats

th3_computation.title: TH3 Computation Flag
th3_computation.description: Compute vertex-wise volume by dividing each obliquely truncated trilateral pyramid into three tetrahedra
